data.name: TableFilterField2
desc: describes a single condition in a filter descriptor.
This struct has the FilterOperator2 constants group as member, whereas the TableFilterField struct uses the FilterOperator enum.

items.name: Connection
lines: specifies how the condition is connected to the previous condition.

items.name: Field
lines: specifies which field (column) is used for the condition.

items.name: IsNumeric
lines: selects whether the TableFilterField2.NumericValue or the TableFilterField2.StringValue is used.

items.name: NumericValue
lines: specifies a numeric value for the condition.

items.name: Operator
lines: specifies the type of the condition as defined in FilterOperator2.

items.name: StringValue
lines: specifies a string value for the condition.
